name: Sin of Pride
description: If a friendly Electro character has Crowfeather Cover attached, their Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst deal +1 additional DMG.
descriptionraw: If a friendly {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114063]</color> attached, their <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Skill</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Burst</color> deal +1 additional DMG.
